events.name: Rest Day
events.description:
Rest day, no workout.
(Ref: FTP 314 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: High-Intensity Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description:
Warmup, 5x1 min sprints, Z2 recovery, cooldown. Focus on power output.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin (INDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Tempo/Threshold Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description:
Warmup, 3x10 min at threshold, low cadence, Z2 recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin (INDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Long Endurance Ride (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
4h ride in Z2, focus on endurance. Hydrate and fuel adequately.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Threshold/SS/Tempo Focus (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
90 min ride, focus on threshold and tempo efforts.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)
